杞人之憂.definition: lit. the fear held by a man of 杞[Qi3] that the sky would fall (idiom); fig. groundless fears

杞人憂天.definition: lit. like the man of 杞[Qi3] who feared the sky would fall (idiom); fig. to entertain groundless fears

杞國.definition: the State of Qǐ in modern Qǐ county 杞縣|杞县, Henan (c. 1500-445 BC), a small vassal state of Shang and Western Zhou for most of its existence

杞國之憂.definition: see 杞人之憂|杞人之忧[Qi3ren2 zhi1 you1]

杞國憂天.definition: see 杞人憂天|杞人忧天[Qi3ren2-you1tian1]

杞天之慮.definition: see 杞人之憂|杞人之忧[Qi3ren2 zhi1 you1]

杞婦.definition: the wife of 杞梁[Qi3 Liang2], a senior official of the state of Qi 杞[Qi3] who died on a military expedition; (fig.) a widow

杞縣.definition: Qi county in Kaifeng 開封|开封[Kai1 feng1], Henan
